Class PlanningPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.PlanningPhase
public class PlanningPhase extends Object
Handling of the Planning Phase in the turn of the player

      Answers if an Assistant Card is playable
      Parameters:
      choice - AssistantCard to check
      Returns:
      true if the card has not been yet played or if there are still playable cards available
